Unix/Linux only - consider using cross-platform disk monitoring libraries

summary.text: 接收(totalMB, freeMB, usedMB)的回调函数。Callback function receiving (totalMB, freeMB, usedMB)

text.comment: 接收(totalMB, freeMB, usedMB)的回调函数。Callback function receiving (totalMB, freeMB, usedMB)

Function:

harddrive

Description:

使用'df -k'命令获取磁盘使用信息（仅Unix/Linux）。Gets disk usage information using 'df -k' command for storage monitoring on Unix/Linux systems.

Example:

// Monitor disk space harddrive((total, free, used) => { const usagePercent = (used / total) * 100; console.log(Disk usage: ${usagePercent.toFixed(1)}% (${used}/${total} MB));

if (usagePercent > 90) { console.warn('Disk space critically low!'); } });

Example:
// Automated cleanup trigger
if (platform() !== 'win32') {
  harddrive((total, free, used) => {
    if (free < 1000) { // Less than 1GB free
      console.log('Triggering cleanup: low disk space');
      // Trigger cleanup logic
    }
  });
}
Deprecated:

Unix/Linux only - consider using cross-platform disk monitoring libraries
